name: Prototype Rancour
r1: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
r2: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 5% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
r3: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
r4: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 7% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
r5: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 8% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
